commit.message: code review changes and missing tests
depth first iterator and bind dependencies at the dao level
fixed manager tests and added missing test
need to run more than once an hour to detect in test

nodes.bodyText: If you want to enforce the random access constant guarantee consider using an array, or alternatively check the instanceOf RandomAccess marker interface.
You can probably remove the return
This might throw if the list of not of JsonSchema.
You can probably remove this import
We can leave this at the original 1 hour interval and update the test-context.xml to override this property
